items.title: Fujifilm to begin shipping 40TB Ultrium tape cartridges in January 2026 â€” updated LTO Ultrium 10 archival storage can hold 100TB of compressed data in 0.8-inch thick cartridge
items.summary: Fujifilm has confirmed that its new LTO Ultrium 10 data cartridges with 40TB native capacity will begin shipping in January 2026.

items.title: Bethell has 'more to do' to remain number three
items.summary: Jacob Bethell says he wants to remain England's number three but admits he has "a lot more to do" to make the position his own.

items.title: Grab this RTX 4050 HP Victus gaming laptop for just $599.99 â€” save $300 on budget-friendly 15.6-inch laptop featuring AMD Ryzen CPU and 16GB of RAM
items.summary: This sub-$600 HP Victus 15 is a budget-friendly 1080p gaming laptops featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 7445HS CPU, Nvidia GeForce RTX 4050 GPU, 16GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD.
